New album 'Pacifica' is out now in Australia & US on Modular Recordings. Get your copy now: http://pacifica.thepresets.com

This remix available for download for the price of an email address: http://emailunlock.com/modularpeople/ghosts-hermitude-trapped-in

description:
The electronic duo Hermitude bring synths, turntables, samplers and (limited vocals) to create a huge sound and a smashing live show.
2011 Tour
Fri Nov 18 - East Brunswick Hotel - Melbourne (Vic launch)
Sat Nov 19 - Shine On Festival - Beaufort VIC
Fri Nov 25 - X and Y Bar - Brisbane (QLD launch)
Fri Dec 2 - Gearins - Katoomba
Sat Dec 3 - Subsonic Festival - Barrington Tops
Fri Dec 9 - The Standard - Sydney (NSW launch)
Sat Dec 10 - Summer Rhythms Festival - Canberra
